docs.lead_paragraph: How does having a baby affect the quality of a marriage? Does it substantially worsen a couple's relationship? What kinds of marriages are likely to be most disrupted by the arrival of a baby? A continuing study of more than 250 families has provided insights about the transition to parenthood. ''We are finding that having babies doesn't turn good marriages into bad ones or bad marriages into good ones,'' said Jay Belsky, director of the study, which is known as the Pennsylvania Child and Family Development Project. ''The best marriages THE FAMILYseemed to stay the best after the arrival of the baby, and the worst marriages stayed the worst.

headline.main: CHANGES IN MARRIAGE WHEN A BABY IS BORN
